p.s: When asked, what impact the story of The Hate U Give had on me and my life, I can tell that on my perspective the film has shown realistic parts of a teenage life and their challangeschallenges.
It has shown what feelings about the society and pressure from people around you means, also individually that not anyone has the same opportunities and chances in life.
Besides that, very important theme of the story was racism.
For me it really opened my eyes especially about indirect racism.
That people do not have to speak for example directly racist with a black person to be racist and that small details in reaction can cause big insecurities and society problems.
All in all, I really liked the story of The Hate U Give, because I think it can open many peoplespeople's eyes about serious tpoics in society and also is a very exciting story.
